Info.Description: Victory to all members of the winning team
Victory to all survivors of the winning team (in addition to the points for victory)
To all survivors for the survival
To all survivors for the draw (in addition to the points for survive)
To innocents for imprison an innocent (only those who voted against him)
To innocents for imprison the Commissioner (only those who voted against him) (in addition to the points for imprison an innocent)
To innocents and mafia for imprison an yakuza, to citizens and mafia for imprison a mafioso (only those who voted against him)
To the Commissioner/Homeless/Sheriff/Highlander for killing/locating mafioso/yakuza
To the Commissioner/Homeless/Sheriff for killing innocent
To the Sheriff/Highlander for killing the Commisioner (in addition to the points for killing an innocent)
To mafia and yakuza for any murder
To mafia for killing yakuza and vice versa (in addition to the points for any murder)
To mafia and yakuza for killing the Commissioner (in addition to the points for any murder)
To the Layer for locating the Commissioner
To the Wench for blocking the Commissioner
To the Wench for blocking a mafioso/yakuza
To the Hoodlum for blocking the Commissioner
To the Hoodlum for blocking a mafioso
To the Doctor for saving an innocent
To the Doctor for saving the Commissioner (in addition to points for saving an innocent)
To the Doctor for saving a mafiozo
To the Judge for justify an innocent
To the Judge for justify the Commissioner (in addition to points for justify an innocent)
To the Judge for justify a mafioso/yakuza
To a neutral Character for any murder
To the Hacker for each check
To the Hacker for each check of a unique role (not citizen, mafioso or yakuza) (in addition to points for each check)
To the Chuck Norris for any action
